name: Shining pepperweed, Peppergrass, Tongue grass
overview: This plant is very short lived since it is usually an annual weed. However, it grows in vast amounts and could be found in many places. Can be seen all seasons and is not endangered.
habitat: Native to western America from Nevada, California to Baja California. It can thrive in a diverse range of habitats but is mostly found in California in along the coastline.
tags: spoon shaped petals flower plant red shiny Lepidium nitidum var. nitidum Shining pepperweed plants
